GlossaryTerm.TermName: stage I adult primary liver cancer

TermDefinition.DefinitionText: There is one tumor and it has not spread to nearby blood vessels.

MediaLink.alt: Pronunciation of dictionary term "stage I adult primary liver cancer"
Pronunciation of dictionary term "cáncer primario de hígado en adultos en estadio I"

GlossaryTerm.SpanishTermName: cáncer primario de hígado en adultos en estadio I

SpanishTermDefinition.DefinitionText: Hay un solo tumor y no se ha diseminado hasta los ganglios linfáticos cercanos.
